DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: DONATO, Katarzyna Z.;Donato, Katarzyna Z.;K. Z. Donato;DONATO, K. Z.;DONATO, K.Z.;KATARZYNA, DONATO;Zawada Donato,Katarzyna;ZAWADA DONATO, KATARZYNA

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Graduation and Master degree in Sciences in chemical technology with specialization in the industrial and environmental chemical analysis, obtained at Rzeszw University of Technology, Poland.
ERASMUS scholarship at Lappenranta University of Technology, Finland.
UNESCO/IUPAC Postgraduate Course in Polymer Science at Institute of Macromolecular Chemistry in Prague, Czech Republic.
PhD abroad research CNPq fellowship at Institute of Polymer, Comosites and Biomaterials (IPCB) -CNR,ENEA, Portici, Italy.
PhD in material chemistry at Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul, Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Specialties: polymer nanocomposites, sol-gel, ionic liquids, hydrogels, materials characterization
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Graduation and Master degree in Sciences in chemical technology with specialization in the industrial and environmental chemical analysis, obtained at Rzeszw University of Technology, Poland.
ERASMUS scholarship at Lappenranta University of Technology, Finland.
UNESCO/IUPAC Postgraduate Course in Polymer Science at Institute of Macromolecular Chemistry in Prague, Czech Republic.
PhD abroad research CNPq fellowship at Institute of Polymer, Comosites and Biomaterials (IPCB) -CNR,ENEA, Portici, Italy.
PhD in material chemistry at Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul, Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Specialties: polymer nanocomposites, sol-gel, ionic liquids, hydrogels, analytical chemistry

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Mtodos alternativos de esfoliao de materiais bidimensionais em grande escala
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: studo de processos de esfoliao de materiais bidimensionais em grande escala, que no apresentem processos oxidativos agressivos ou resduos nocivos, e que possam ser diretamente adaptados a processos industriais j existentes
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Mtodos alternativos de esfoliao de materiais bidimensionais em grande escala

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Graphene 3D - Multifunctional Graphene-based Nanocomposites with Robust Electromagnetic and Thermal Properties for 3D-printing Application
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: The RISE proposal Graphene 3D will set up an intercontinental and inter-sectoral network of organizations, working on a joint research program in the field of graphene-based polymer nanocomposite materials for additive manufacturing application. The project will enable staff exchanges and sharing of knowledge, this helping to turn creative ideas into innovative graphene-based products.
